data.title: S&P 500 Index - 90 Year Historical Chart
data.meta_description: Interactive chart of the S&P 500 stock market index since 1927. Historical data is inflation-adjusted using the headline CPI and each data point represents the month-end closing value. The current month is updated on an hourly basis with today's latest value.
data.text:
Interactive chart of the S&P 500 stock market index since 1927. Historical data is inflation-adjusted using the headline CPI and each data point represents the month-end closing value. The current month is updated on an hourly basis with today's latest value. The current price of the S&P 500 as of August 16, 2024 is 5,554.25.

We Need Your Support!

Backlinks from other websites are the lifeblood of our site and a primary source of new traffic.
